name: Downfall
description:
Eye For An Eye's debut album "Downfall"

   1. Never Be Free
   2. Ask No Questions
   3. Until Im Done
   4. Getting Old
   5. Downfall
   6. Seven Gods Of Chaos
   7. Final Sunrise
   8. Its Been A Long Time
   9. Another Life
  10. Brother



A glorious amalgamation of Thin Lizzy and Motorhead, guitarists/vocalists Tom Norris and Tom Bull, bassist Chris Ford, and drummer Rich Cowdry have created a hard rock monster with Downfall. A riproaring ten tracks of molten modern rock including 'Ask No Questions' and 'Seven Gods Of Chaos', Eye For An Eye will kick your ass and make you like it! 

BIG CHEESE  5/5

name: THE SICK SOUNDS SAMPLER
description:
Tracklisting:
1. seven year kismet - the shame of grace  
2. i defy - never ending lie
3. violent virues - condemned complex  
4. agonyst - centennial
5. malacite - dust  
6. the hand of glory - break the illusion
7. los - gold  
8. eye for an eye - seven gods of chaos
9. switchblade scream - paint the picture  
10. southshore - opaque
11. lasting traces - the secenssionist  
12. fall to the frontline - 1000 days
13. let the games begin - the fine detail of panning
14. infractor - discorporated  
15. daor - the truth, the way, the gun
16. wynken delirium - the song that's not supposed to be

Left For Dead Records are proud to bring you the SICK SOUNDS SAMPLER. 
An inspirational collection of alternative rock music from the depths of the
underground rock world. Bringing together sixteen unsigned artists spanning as
diverse genres as Death Metal through to Dirty Blues, Glam through to Stoner Rock,
this carefully constructed compilation brings the best from all areas of the alternative
world in to one inspirational mix taking you on a journey you are not likely to
encounter elsewhere.

THE SICK SOUNDS SAMPLER is on general release on the 27th November 2011,
available from all artists, as well as the LEFT FOR DEAD RECORDS website, 
and all good digital distributors.

For further information, press and artist contacts, please email info@lfdrecords.co.uk

www.lfdrecords.co.uk
www.mantra-music.co.uk
